personal_info.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 9+ years of experience in designing and implementing enterprise-scale microservices architectures for banking and SaaS platforms. Proven track record leading cross-functional teams to deliver high performance, multi-tenant systems. Seeking Solution Architect role in fintech/enterprise/niche software.
